ingredients: 1 lb Turbinado Sugar (added last 5 minutes of boil)
1 oz - Amarillo Hops (dry hop after 4 days in primary)
1 oz - Amarillo Hops (dry hop in secondary after 7 days in primary)
1 - Whirlfloc tablet last 5 mins of boil
Safale US-05 Yeast pitched at 75 degrees
name: S.O.D. Milano Mash (Mosh)
